eu.linksmart.clients
Interface RemoteWSClientProvider

public interface RemoteWSClientProvider

This interface can be used for retrieve the client stub for a LinkSmart Java Manager

Method Detail

getManagerClients

java.lang.String[] getManagerClients()
Retrieves a list of available manager clients

Returns:
an array with the list of available manager clients

getRemoteWSClient

java.lang.Object getRemoteWSClient(java.lang.String className,
                                   java.lang.String endpoint,
                                   boolean coreSecurityConfig)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
This method retrieves the client stubs for a LinkSmart Java Manager. Providing a className for the service desired, this method returns a client Remote object, that can be casted to the specific service interface in order to call the desired methods (it is required that the Manager WS interface extends java.rmi.Remote

The interface of this method also accepts to configure the endpoint where the service is located (even using SOAP Tunneling) and the Core LinkSmart Security Configuration.

Parameters:
className - The class name for the service interface to be called (for example, eu.linksmart.network.NetworkManagerApplication)
endpoint - The endpoint to be used, or null if you want to use the default one
coreSecurityConfig - true if you want use coreLinkSmartSecurity (will encrypt messages)
Returns:
Remote containing the client stubs for the required service
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if there is an exception during code generation
